weka.dl4j.layers

Class SubsamplingLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.layers.Layer<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.SubsamplingLayer>
      • weka.dl4j.layers.SubsamplingLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ApiWrapper<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.SubsamplingLayer>

    public class SubsamplingLayer
extends Layer<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.SubsamplingLayer>
implements weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    A version of DeepLearning4j's SubsamplingLayer that implements WEKA option handling.
